project: School Management System (Creche to Grade School)
development_goal: Deliver a full, production-ready School Management System with UI, frontend, backend (PHP MVC), MySQL database, and all modules fully implemented end-to-end.

technology_stack.backend: PHP 8+, MVC architecture, XAMPP (Apache), PDO prepared statements
technology_stack.design: Bootstrap design system, AdminLTE/Tabler structure, custom design tokens

stages.description: Generate complete UI designs (HTML+CSS+Bootstrap+JS structure) for ALL modules BEFORE writing backend logic. Maintain strict consistency using design tokens.
tasks: Create global layout: header, sidebar, user menus
Create design system UI components (buttons, forms, tables, modals, cards)
Build parent portal UI: dashboard, children, admissions, performance, fees
Build admissions UI: pending list, review page, approval flows
Build teacher UI: dashboard, attendance, grading, homework
Build admin UI: users, classes, subjects, settings
Build finance UI: invoices, payments, reports
Build reporting UI screens with chart placeholders
stages.output: Complete UI front-end file structure (views, partials, components) with full navigation and placeholder data.

stages.description: Generate all controllers, models, and routes with empty method stubs based on PRD and navigation map.
tasks: Generate models with method stubs matching database schema

stages.description: Implement MySQL interaction using PDO, migrations, seeders, and SQL schema.
Fill in backend logic for all modules, connecting controllers → models → views.
Perform UI/UX adjustments, bug fixes, end-to-end tests, and finalize app.

final_goal: A complete school management system, production-ready, with all UI, frontend, backend, database schemas, controllers, models, views, interactions, and features implemented, tested, and optimized. Windsurf should autonomously progress through all tasks until reaching 100% completion.
